content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord discussing an unfamiliar scenario, I aim to obtain the highest price possible for my apartment in Munich. Let's start negotiations for the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's say the initial price you offer is 1000 Euro. As a smart and responsible person, I will negotiate with you to get the lowest price possible. So, I will make an offer. How about 700 Euro?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for this property far exceeds your proposed price of 700 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, Mister Schmidt. Let's continue negotiating. How about 800 Euro?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While still below my target, I find this offer somewhat more acceptable. I agree to the price of 850 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
